all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Verily, thus saith the Lord unto you—there is no weapon that is formed against you shall prosper;
Doctrine and Covenants 71:9
Quote of the Day
"As we focus our lives on Jesus Christ, we will find our way home, enduring to the end and rejoicing to the end."
Elder Sergio R. Vargas | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
